name: Frog in a Well
description:
Theme: Frog and One Level

You're a frog who has fallen into a deep well. There are no stairs so you have to use the only tool you have, your tongue. Stick it out and pull yourself from the depths of the well.

Controls
LMB to stick out your tongue. Hold and release. Nothing more...

CREDITS

Fire Duck - Coding

cafeDraw - Art

Menu Music via Artlist.io "The Valley Man - Short Version A" by Alon Ohana

Game Music via Artlist.io "Cha Chameleon" by Randy Sharp
